command.text: select "ajrTReturnBr"."TReturnBrid" "TReturnBrid" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."CarTripID" "CarTripID" ,"CarTrip"."StartTime" "CarTripStartTime" ,"CarTripEmp_"."Emp_Nmdriver" ,"CarTripcar_Car_Type"."Styl_Nm" "CarTripcar_Car_TypeStyl_Nm" ,"CarTripcar_EMP_"."Emp_Nmdriver" "CarTripcar_EMP_Emp_Nmdriver" ,"CarTripcar_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdesc" "CarTripcar_caseoperationdesccaseoperationdesc" ,"CarTripcar_carclass"."carclassname" "CarTripcar_carclasscarclassname" ,"CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmpname" "CarTripcar_Insu_CmpInsu_Cmpname" ,"CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmpname" "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp1Insu_Cmpname" ,"CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmpname" "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp2Insu_Cmpname" ,"CarTripcar_kind"."carkinddesc" "CarTripcar_kindcarkinddesc" ,"CarTripcar_carstutus_"."carstutus_name" "CarTripcar_carstutus_carstutus_name" ,"CarTripcar_Car_Colr"."Color_name" "CarTripcar_Car_ColrColor_name" ,"CarTripcar_fuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayname" "CarTripcar_fuelllevelFuellevelDisplayname" ,"CarTripcar_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "CarTripcar_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"CarTripcar_Guarantee"."Guaranteename" "CarTripcar_GuaranteeGuaranteename" ,"CarTripcar_Insurance_type"."Insurance_name" "CarTripcar_Insurance_typeInsurance_name" ,"CarTripcar_Car_Lik"."Like_name" "CarTripcar_Car_LikLike_name" ,"CarTripcar_padnatureway"."padnatureway" "CarTripcar_padnaturewaypadnatureway" ,"CarTripcar_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_Nm" "CarTripcar_Fbrct_CntryCntry_Nm" ,"CarTripcar_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "CarTripcar_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"CarTripcar_Cstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "CarTripcar_Cstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"CarTripcar_Sup_"."Sup_Nm" "CarTripcar_Sup_Sup_Nm" ,"CarTripcar_Tamweelreq"."Tamweeldeatails" "CarTripcar_TamweelreqTamweeldeatails" ,"CarTripcntst"."status_name" "CarTripcntststatus_name" ,"CarTripFuel"."Fuellevelname" "CarTripFuelFuellevelname" ,"CarTripRtFuel"."Fuellevelname" "CarTripRtFuelFuellevelname" ,"CarTripsgm"."sgm_Nm" "CarTripsgmsgm_Nm" ,"CarTripsgmOpco"."OpcoName" "CarTripsgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"CarTripTripKind"."TripKindDesc" "CarTripTripKindTripKindDesc" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."Brokenlistid" "Brokenlistid" ,"Brokenlist"."BrokenlistDesc" "BrokenlistBrokenlistDesc" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."Brokenlistamount" "Brokenlistamount" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."Notes" "Notes" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."ModifiedByUserId" "ModifiedByUserId" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."CreatedById" "CreatedById" ,"ajrTReturnBr"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" from "dbo"."ajrTReturnBr" "ajrTReturnBr" left join "dbo"."CarTrip" "CarTrip" on "ajrTReturnBr"."CarTripID" = "CarTrip"."CarTripID" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "CarTripEmp_" on "CarTrip"."Emp_No" = "CarTripEmp_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "CarTripEmp_sgm" on "CarTripEmp_"."sgm" = "CarTripEmp_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "CarTripEmp_Emp_no1" on "CarTripEmp_"."Emp_no1" = "CarTripEmp_Emp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."CarInfom" "CarTripcar_" on "CarTrip"."car_no" = "CarTripcar_"."Car_No" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "CarTripcar_Car_Type" on "CarTripcar_"."Car_Type" = "CarTripcar_Car_Type"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "CarTripcar_EMP_" on "CarTripcar_"."EMP_NO" = "CarTripcar_EMP_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."carcaseoperationdesc" "CarTripcar_caseoperationdesc" on "CarTripcar_"."caseoperationdescid" = "CarTripcar_caseoperationdesc"."caseoperationdescid" left join "dbo"."carclass" "CarTripcar_carclass" on "CarTripcar_"."carclass" = "CarTripcar_carclass"."carclass" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp" on "CarTripcar_"."Insu_Cmp" = "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp1" on "CarTripcar_"."Insu_Cmp1" = "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp1"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carInsuCmplist" "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp2" on "CarTripcar_"."Insu_Cmp2" = "CarTripcar_Insu_Cmp2"."Insu_Cmp" left join "dbo"."carkindlist" "CarTripcar_kind" on "CarTripcar_"."kind" = "CarTripcar_kind"."carkindid" left join "dbo"."carstutuslist" "CarTripcar_carstutus_" on "CarTripcar_"."carstutus_no" = "CarTripcar_carstutus_"."carstutus_no" left join "dbo"."Colorlist" "CarTripcar_Car_Colr" on "CarTripcar_"."Car_Colr" = "CarTripcar_Car_Colr"."ColorNo" left join "dbo"."FuellevelDisplay" "CarTripcar_fuelllevel" on "CarTripcar_"."fuelllevel" = "CarTripcar_fuelllevel"."FuellevelDisplayid" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "CarTripcar_sgm" on "CarTripcar_"."sgm" = "CarTripcar_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Guaranteelist" "CarTripcar_Guarantee" on "CarTripcar_"."Guarantee" = "CarTripcar_Guarantee"."Guarantee" left join "dbo"."Insurancetype" "CarTripcar_Insurance_type" on "CarTripcar_"."Insurance_type" = "CarTripcar_Insurance_type"."Insurance_type" left join "dbo"."Likelist" "CarTripcar_Car_Lik" on "CarTripcar_"."Car_Lik" = "CarTripcar_Car_Lik"."LikeNo" left join "dbo"."padnaturewaylist" "CarTripcar_padnatureway" on "CarTripcar_"."padnaturewayid" = "CarTripcar_padnatureway"."padnaturewayid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "CarTripcar_Fbrct_Cntry" on "CarTripcar_"."Fbrct_Cntry" = "CarTripcar_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "CarTripcar_Ownr_" on "CarTripcar_"."Ownr_No" = "CarTripcar_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "CarTripcar_Cstm_" on "CarTripcar_"."Cstm_No" = "CarTripcar_Cstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."Stsuplir" "CarTripcar_Sup_" on "CarTripcar_"."Sup_No" = "CarTripcar_Sup_"."Sup_No" left join "dbo"."Tamweelrequest" "CarTripcar_Tamweelreq" on "CarTripcar_"."Tamweelreqid" = "CarTripcar_Tamweelreq"."Tamweelreqid" left join "dbo"."contractstatus" "CarTripcntst" on "CarTrip"."cntstcode" = "CarTripcntst"."cntstcode" left join "dbo"."Fuellevel" "CarTripFuel" on "CarTrip"."Fuel" = "CarTripFuel"."Fuellevelid" left join "dbo"."Fuellevel" "CarTripRtFuel" on "CarTrip"."RtFuel" = "CarTripRtFuel"."Fuellevelid" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "CarTripsgm" on "CarTrip"."sgm" = "CarTripsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "CarTripsgmOpco" on "CarTripsgm"."OpcoID" = "CarTripsgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."TripKindlist" "CarTripTripKind" on "CarTrip"."TripKindid" = "CarTripTripKind"."TripKindid" left join "dbo"."ajrBrokenlist" "Brokenlist" on "ajrTReturnBr"."Brokenlistid" = "Brokenlist"."Brokenlistid"
